Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by FridayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Friday.

Attribute.Name: TransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by DefaultTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
The default transit days between the 2 nodes. This will be used in transit time calculations if day-specific transit days is not defined.
